sourceMeaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>spoon</radical> to the <radical>sun</radical> to be able to take a bite. It's <kanji>delicious</kanji>, you hear. That's the <kanji>point</kanji> of the spoon.
meaningInfo: Taste that delicious sun. It doesn't even burn!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>delicious</kanji> taste is... familiar somehow. You take a few more bites and then scream. It tastes like <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>)!
readingInfo: You had your eyes closed because the sun is so bright. When you open them you realize the delicious sun you were eating is really just a giant, really bright, cooked sheep. You should probably point this out to NASA or something.
